entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
